verses.verse: And <WG2532> you <WG5209> hath he quickened, who were <WG5607> dead <WG3498> in trespasses <WG3900> and <WG2532> sins <WG266>

Wherein <WG1722> <WG3739> in time past <WG4218> ye walked <WG4043> according <WG2596> to the <WG3588> course <WG165> of this <WG5127> world, <WG2889> according <WG2596> to the <WG3588> prince <WG758> of the <WG3588> power <WG1849> of the <WG3588> air, <WG109> the <WG3588> spirit <WG4151> that now worketh <WG1754> <WG3568> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> children <WG5207> of disobedience: <WG543>

Among <WG1722> whom <WG3739> also <WG2532> we <WG2249> all <WG3956> had our conversation <WG390> in times past <WG4218> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> lusts <WG1939> of our <WG2257> flesh, <WG4561> fulfilling <WG4160> the <WG3588> desires <WG2307> of the <WG3588> flesh <WG4561> and <WG2532> of the <WG3588> mind; <WG1271> and <WG2532> were <WG2258> by nature <WG5449> the children <WG5043> of wrath, <WG3709> even <WG2532> as <WG5613> others. <WG3062>
But <WG1161> God, <WG2316> who is <WG5607> rich <WG4145> in <WG1722> mercy, <WG1656> for <WG1223> his <WG848> great <WG4183> love <WG26> wherewith <WG3739> he loved <WG25> us, <WG2248>
Even <WG2532> when we <WG2248> were <WG5607> dead <WG3498> in sins, <WG3900> hath quickened us together <WG4806> with Christ, by <WG5547> (grace <WG5485> ye are <WG2075> saved;) <WG4982>
And <WG2532> hath raised us up together, <WG4891> and <WG2532> made us sit together <WG4776> in <WG1722> heavenly <WG2032> places in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus: <WG2424>

That <WG2443> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> ages <WG165> to come <WG1904> he might show <WG1731> the <WG3588> exceeding <WG5235> riches <WG4149> of his <WG848> grace <WG5485> in <WG1722> his kindness <WG5544> toward <WG1909> us <WG2248> through <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>

For <WG1063> by grace <WG5485> are <WG2075> ye saved <WG4982> through <WG1223> faith; <WG4102> and <WG2532> that <WG5124> not <WG3756> of <WG1537> yourselves: <WG5216> it is the <WG3588> gift <WG1435> of God: <WG2316>
Not <WG3756> of <WG1537> works, <WG2041> lest <WG3363> any man <WG5100> should boast. <WG2744>

For <WG1063> we are <WG2070> his <WG846> workmanship, <WG4161> created <WG2936> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> unto <WG1909> good <WG18> works, <WG2041> which <WG3739> God <WG2316> hath before ordained <WG4282> that <WG2443> we should walk <WG4043> in <WG1722> them. <WG846>

Wherefore <WG1352> remember, <WG3421> that <WG3754> ye <WG5210> being in time past <WG4218> Gentiles <WG1484> in <WG1722> the flesh, <WG4561> who <WG3588> are called <WG3004> Uncircumcision <WG203> by <WG5259> that which is called <WG3004> the Circumcision <WG4061> in <WG1722> the flesh <WG4561> made by hands; <WG5499>

That <WG3754> at <WG1722> that <WG1565> time <WG2540> ye were <WG2258> without <WG5565> Christ, <WG5547> being aliens <WG526> from the <WG3588> commonwealth <WG4174> of Israel, <WG2474> and <WG2532> strangers <WG3581> from the <WG3588> covenants <WG1242> of promise, <WG1860> having <WG2192> no <WG3361> hope, <WG1680> and <WG2532> without God <WG112> in <WG1722> the <WG3588> world: <WG2889>

But <WG1161> now <WG3570> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> ye <WG5210> who sometimes were <WG5607> <WG4218> far off <WG3112> are made <WG1096> nigh <WG1451> by <WG1722> the <WG3588> blood <WG129> of Christ. <WG5547>

For <WG1063> he <WG846> is <WG2076> our <WG2257> peace, <WG1515> who hath made <WG4160> both <WG297> one, <WG1520> and <WG2532> hath broken down <WG3089> the <WG3588> middle wall <WG3320> of partition <WG5418> between us;

Having abolished <WG2673> in <WG1722> his <WG848> flesh <WG4561> the <WG3588> enmity, <WG2189> even the <WG3588> law <WG3551> of commandments <WG1785> contained in <WG1722> ordinances; <WG1378> for to <WG2443> make <WG2936> in <WG1722> himself <WG1438> of twain <WG1417> <WG1519> one <WG1520> new <WG2537> man, <WG444> so making <WG4160> peace; <WG1515>

And <WG2532> that he might reconcile <WG604> both <WG297> unto God <WG2316> in <WG1722> one <WG1520> body <WG4983> by <WG1223> the <WG3588> cross, <WG4716> having slain <WG615> the <WG3588> enmity <WG2189> thereby: <WG1722> <WG846>
And <WG2532> came <WG2064> and preached <WG2097> peace <WG1515> to you <WG5213> which were afar off, <WG3112> and <WG2532> to them that were nigh. <WG1451>
For <WG3754> through <WG1223> him <WG846> we both <WG297> have <WG2192> access <WG4318> by <WG1722> one <WG1520> Spirit <WG4151> unto <WG4314> the <WG3588> Father. <WG3962>

Now <WG686> therefore <WG3767> ye are <WG2075> no more <WG3765> strangers <WG3581> and <WG2532> foreigners, <WG3941> but <WG235> fellow citizens <WG4847> with the <WG3588> saints, <WG40> and <WG2532> of the household <WG3609> of God; <WG2316>

And are built <WG2026> upon <WG1909> the <WG3588> foundation <WG2310> of the <WG3588> apostles <WG652> and <WG2532> prophets, <WG4396> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> himself <WG846> being <WG5607> the chief corner <WG204> stone;
In <WG1722> whom <WG3739> all <WG3956> the <WG3588> building <WG3619> fitly framed together <WG4883> groweth <WG837> unto <WG1519> a holy <WG40> temple <WG3485> in <WG1722> the Lord: <WG2962>
In <WG1722> whom <WG3739> ye <WG5210> also <WG2532> are builded together <WG4925> for <WG1519> a habitation <WG2732> of God <WG2316> through <WG1722> the Spirit. <WG4151>
